verses.verse: The proverbs <WH4912> of Solomon <WH8010> the son <WH1121> of David <WH1732>, king <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478>:
To know <WH3045> wisdom <WH2451> and instruction <WH4148>; To discern <WH995> the words <WH561> of understanding <WH998>;
To receive <WH3947> instruction <WH4148> in wise <WH7919> dealing <WH6664>, In righteousness and justice <WH6664> and equity <WH4339>;
To give <WH5414> prudence <WH6195> to the simple <WH6612>, To the young man <WH5288> knowledge <WH1847> and discretion <WH4209>:
That the wise <WH2450> man may hear <WH8085>, and increase <WH3254> in learning <WH3948>; And that the man of understanding <WH995> may attain <WH7069> unto sound counsels <WH8458>:
To understand <WH995> a proverb <WH4912>, and a figure <WH4426>, The words <WH1697> of the wise <WH2450>, and their dark sayings <WH2420>.
The fear <WH3374> of Jehovah <WH3068> is the beginning <WH7225> of knowledge <WH1847>; But the foolish <WH191> despise <WH936> wisdom <WH2451> and instruction <WH4148>.
My son <WH1121>, hear <WH8085> the instruction <WH4148> of thy father <WH1>, And forsake <WH5203> not the law <WH8451> of thy mother <WH517>:
For they shall be a chaplet <WH3880> of grace <WH2580> unto thy head <WH7218>, And chains <WH6060> about thy neck <WH1621>.
My son <WH1121>, if sinners <WH2400> entice <WH6601> thee <WH14>, Consent thou not.
If they say <WH559>, Come <WH3212> with us <WH693>, Let us lay wait for blood <WH1818>; Let us lurk <WH6845> privily for the innocent <WH5355> without cause <WH2600>;
Let us swallow them up <WH1104> alive <WH2416> as Sheol <WH7585>, And whole <WH8549>, as those that go down <WH3381> into the pit <WH953>;
We shall find <WH4672> all precious <WH3368> substance <WH1952>; We shall fill <WH4390> our houses <WH1004> with spoil <WH7998>;
Thou shalt cast <WH5307> thy lot <WH1486> among <WH8432> us <WH259>; We will all have one purse <WH3599>:
My son <WH1121>, walk <WH3212> not thou in the way <WH1870> with them <WH4513>; Refrain thy foot <WH7272> from their path <WH5410>:
For their feet <WH7272> run <WH7323> to evil <WH7451>, And they make haste <WH4116> to shed <WH8210> blood <WH1818>.
For in vain <WH2600> is the net <WH7568> spread <WH2219> In the sight <WH5869> of any bird <WH1167>:
And these lay wait <WH693> for their own blood <WH1818>; They lurk privily <WH6845> for their own lives <WH5315>.
So are the ways <WH734> of every one that is greedy <WH1214> of gain <WH1215>; It taketh away <WH3947> the life <WH5315> of the owners thereof <WH1167>.
Wisdom <WH2454> crieth <WH7442> aloud in the street <WH2351>; She uttereth <WH5414> her voice <WH6963> in the broad places <WH7339>;
She crieth <WH7121> in the chief place <WH7218> of concourse <WH1993>; At the entrance <WH6607> of the gates <WH8179>, In the city <WH5892>, she uttereth <WH559> her words <WH561>:
How long <WH6612>, ye simple ones, will ye love <WH157> simplicity <WH6612>? And scoffers <WH3887> delight <WH2530> them in scoffing <WH3944>, And fools <WH3684> hate <WH8130> knowledge <WH1847>?
Turn <WH7725> you at my reproof <WH8433>: Behold <WH5042>, I will pour out my spirit <WH7307> upon you <WH3045>; I will make known my words unto you <WH1697>.
Because I have called <WH7121>, and ye have refused <WH3985>; I have stretched out <WH5186> my hand <WH3027>, and no man hath regarded <WH7181>;
But ye have set at nought <WH6544> all my counsel <WH6098>, And would <WH14> none of my reproof <WH8433>:
I also will laugh <WH7832> in the day of your calamity <WH343>; I will mock <WH3932> when your fear <WH6343> cometh <WH935>;
When your fear <WH6343> cometh <WH935> as a storm <WH5492>, And your calamity <WH343> cometh <WH857> on as a whirlwind <WH5492>; When distress <WH6869> and anguish <WH6695> come upon you <WH935>.
Then will they call <WH7121> upon me <WH6030>, but I will not answer; They will seek me diligently <WH7836>, but they shall not find me <WH4672>:
For that they hated <WH8130> knowledge <WH1847>, And did not choose <WH977> the fear <WH3374> of Jehovah <WH3068>:
They would <WH14> none of my counsel <WH6098>; They despised <WH5006> all my reproof <WH8433>.
Therefore shall they eat <WH398> of the fruit <WH6529> of their own way <WH1870>, And be filled <WH7646> with their own devices <WH4156>.
For the backsliding <WH4878> of the simple <WH6612> shall slay <WH2026> them <WH7962>, And the careless ease of fools <WH3684> shall destroy them <WH6>.
But whoso hearkeneth <WH8085> unto me shall dwell <WH7931> securely <WH983>, And shall be quiet <WH7599> without fear <WH6343> of evil <WH7451>.
